bin.name: binning
bin.description: Bin size for images (must be power of 2)

maxpeaks.name: maximum number of peaks
maxpeaks.description: Maximum number of peaks (particles) per image

lp.name: lowpass filter
lp.description: Low pass filter radius in Angstoms

hp.name: highpass filter
hp.description: High pass filter radius in Angstoms

overlapmult.name: overlap distance multiple
overlapmult.description: Distance multiple for two peaks (particles) to overlap

thresh.name: threshold cutoff
thresh.description: Threshold to get peaks from ccmaxmap

maxsize.name: maximum size of a particle
maxsize.description: Maximum size of a particle; defined as: maxsize * (4 pi radius^2)

maxthresh.name: maximum threshold cutoff
maxthresh.description: Maximum threshold to get peaks from dogmap

pixlimit.name: pixel limit filter
pixlimit.description: Limit pixels values to within pixlimit standard deviations of the mean

nojpegs.name: do not create peak jpegs
nojpegs.description: Force particle loop to not make peak summary jpegs
